name: Beyond Hadal
description:
Beyond Hadal is a psychological survival horror game being develop by Rook Studio. It is an unsettling tale that is heavily inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft combined with the Filipino Mythology.

The story is set in a building located on the seaside of the city which was based on the combination of Binondo (Chinatown) and Roxas Boulevard.

The game will feature classic survival horror game mechanics from the likes of Resident Evil and Silent Hill's early titles. With the atmosphere inspired on the STALKER game series and Metro game series.
